/container-use-on.description: Enable Container-Use development environment for all operations
/container-use-on.prompt: From now on, use Container-Use environment for ALL file operations, code work, and shell commands. Create/open environment if needed and use mcp__container-use__* tools exclusively. Follow the Container-Use workflow described in CLAUDE.md.

/container-use-off.description: Disable Container-Use development environment and use standard tools
/container-use-off.prompt: From now on, use standard Claude Code tools (Read, Write, Edit, Bash, etc.) instead of Container-Use environment. Work directly with the local filesystem and standard shell commands.
